fulltext:
PHAM CONG HUAN 
phamhuan471988@gmail.com 
0909 972 993 
SUMMARY 
 
6 years working in software development and maintenance with Microsoft .NET 4.0 
and MS SQL Server. 
 
1,5 years working in software development and maintenance with Microsoft 
Dynamics AX 2012. 
 
Have been in charge of all phases of software development and maintenance life 
cycle. With high technical, business related, English communication. 
 
Business trip to Japan for 2 months to investigate bug cause and fix bug. 
EDUCATION AND TRAINING 
Bachelor of Information Technology (2007 – 2011) 
HUFLIT University Vietnam, Ho Chi Minh City 
SKILLS 
 
Web development technologies: HTML/XHTML, CSS 
 
Programming languages: C#, Delphi, X++, React Native 
 
Mobile development: Android 
 
Frameworks and API's: ASP.Net, ADO.Net, LinQ, Entity, MVVM, iBatis 
 
Operating systems: Windows 
 
Working with SQL Server, Oracle 
 
Office tools: Microsoft Office 2003/2010 (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) 
 
Good at English 
 
Management skill: team management up to 3 members, customer relationship. 
EXPERIENCE 
From 2011 to 2015 
 
Company: FPT Software Ho Chi Minh 
 
Position: Developer, Project Team Leader (from January-2014 until November-2015). 
 
Projects name: Confidence (from February-2012 till 2015) 
o Project description: 
 Develop and maintain medical application for Japanese customer. 
o Responsibilities: 
 Create Functional specification document. 
 Create Architectural and Detail design document. 
 Create Screen specification. 
 Develop business logic. 
 Create unit test code. 
 Execute unit test, integration test and fix bugs. 
o Technologies: 
 Programming language: C# in WPF with MVVM pattern. 
 Framework: .NET 4.0. 
 Database: MS SQL Server 2008. 
From 2015 to 2017 
 
Company: FPT Technology Solutions (FTS) 
 
Position: Developer, Team leader 
 
Project name: Confidence (from 2015 until now) 
o Project description: 
 Develop hospital management software for domestic hospital. 
o Responsibilities: 
 Corporate with BA and other members to analyze business requirement. 
 Develop business logic. 
 Support and transfer project framework to new members. 
 Perform unit test, integration test and fix bugs. 
o Technologies: 
 Programming language: C# with MVVM pattern, iBatis framework 
 Framework: .NET 4.5 
 Database: SQL Server 2014 
From 2017 until now 
 
Company: NTT Communications Vietnam 
 
Position:  Technical Consultant 
 
Project name: Confidence 
o Project description: 
 Implement business logic and maintain ERP rollout project using Microsoft 
Dynamics AX system. 
o Responsibilities: 
 Corporate with Functional consultant and other members to analyze 
requirement and propose business solution to end user. 
 Develop business logic. 
 Support and transfer project to new members. 
 Support, training and manage vendors task. 
 Perform unit test, integration test and fix bugs. 
o Technologies: 
 Programming language: X++ 
 Framework: .NET 4.0 
 Database: SQL Server 2012 
Website Developer 
 
Individual Projects 
o Graduation project – Laptop shopping online website 
 Built a business website with C#.Net 
 Applied n-Tier technique 
 Database: Microsoft SQL Server 
 Used UML to design and analyze the system architecture 
Software Developer 
 
Team Projects 
o Restaurant Management, 
 Used C# to develop a system to maintain meals, menu and calculate the cash. 
o Student Management System 
 Used C# to develop the system 
 Supported students to register a course, withdraw from a course, check 
schedule and update mark. 
o Convenience store Management 
 Used C# and Entity framework to develop a system to maintain convenience 
store activities. 
 Supported user to manage product, employee, and customer information. 
 Supported user to manage warehouse, finance etc… 
SOFT SKILLS 
 
Adaptable to a new working environment. 
 
Enquiring mind to learn. 
 
Hard working and flexible to deal with projects. 
 
Able to learn new technologies quickly. 
 
Time management. 
EXTRACURRICULAR ACTIVITIES 
 
Joined in all outside team building activities. 
 
Being a member of company football team. 
 
Took part in the HUFLIT Football Championship. 
 
Supported HUFLIT Musical Group. 
 
Teaching Mathematics for the 7th grade pupil. 
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
